title: 异常停止是怎么回事?
author: 渣楠~
txt_content:
[14:41:51 ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to Spigot!):
[14:41:51 ERROR]: ------------------------------
[14:41:51 ERROR]: Current Thread: Server thread
[14:41:51 ERROR]:       Stack:
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.http.HttpClient$1.run(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.http.HttpClient$1.run(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.privilegedOpenServer(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect0(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)
[14:41:51 ERROR]:               sun.net.www.

以上就是服务器启动器突然停止运行的什么什么鬼东西，看不懂，翻译了也看不懂，怎么解决？

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content: 你发的不没法看，把log整个上传

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
不完整的。
